
# PayLane 
![paylane](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/paylane/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `paylane` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] PayLane 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  PayLane is an online payments provider. We help e√¢??businesses accept online payments as smooth as possible and anywhere in the world. Delivering a vast variety of 30+ payment methods and 160+ currencies, PayLane allows businesses to reach more customers in selected markets. We've broadened our offer with many extra payment services such as: single-click payments, recurring payments, easy integration, plugins, Automatic Payment Optimizer and mobile payments application that increase selling efficiency and improve the purchasing experience.
